description: In a world of news and gossip, super villains spread fake news to create confusion. Outsmart them, expose their tricks and reveal the truth.
In a technology-driven world, the BOTS spread deepfakes and algorithms driven lies through images and videos.
The OLIGS create fake news to earn more money and control people with their corporate and financial power.
The BIOSTS scam innocent townsfolk with fake cures for their health problems to gain money, fame and control.
The CELEBS sell fake products and use their own social media fame to fool the public with false promises and fake exclusivity.
